definition: what are you doing?/whatever for?/why on earth?
tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)
modal particle indicating that sth is obvious/particle indicating a pause for emphasis

sentences.english: No, I don't think I have any plans. Why do you ask?
sentences.chinese: 不忙，我想我没什么安排。你问来干嘛？

sentences.english: Oh god, here we go again. Count's in 15minutes. What are you doing?
sentences.chinese: 哦天啊，又来了。15分钟后就要点名了，你要干嘛？

sentences.english: What will he be doing at 10a. m tomorrow?
sentences.chinese: 明天早上十点他会在干嘛？

sentences.english: When Cheryl asks, "Why did you steal my recipe?"
sentences.chinese: 当谢丽儿问起“你干嘛偷我食谱？”

sentences.english: Why did you buy him a hairbrush?He's as bald as a coot!
sentences.chinese: 你干嘛给他买梳子？他头上光秃秃的，一根头发。

sentences.english: They came straight towards the little daisy, which could not understand what they wanted.
sentences.chinese: 他们直朝着不懂他们要干嘛的小雏菊走来。

sentences.english: Gaby: What are you doing with her, John?
sentences.chinese: 你跟她在一起是想干嘛，约翰？

sentences.english: What you doing down there, flipper bird?
Why not use the logo and header to grab people’s attention?
sentences.chinese: 干嘛不用logo和文头来抓住人们的注意力呢？

sentences.english: You know what he did that night?
sentences.chinese: 你们知道丫那天晚上干嘛了吗？

sentences.english: M: Well, anyway, you need to fork over my 5 dollars now, please.
sentences.chinese: 你那么着急要我给你五块钱干嘛？

sentences.english: Roy:And seriously, what's with the hat, man? Geez.
sentences.chinese: 说正经的，伙计，那帽子是干嘛的？哈。

sentences.english: Lingered upon the pools that stand in drains.
sentences.chinese: 在腔池中游向暗沟去干嘛。

sentences.english: After all, these tiny fishes are lives too, why should they be tortured to death?
sentences.chinese: 小鱼毕竟是条生命，干嘛要活活地憋死它啊？

sentences.english: My in the mind is matchless and depressed, does the die fox have no incident person fashion why?
sentences.chinese: 我心里无比郁闷，死狐狸没事变人样干嘛？

definition: what are you doing?/what's he up to?
dialectal equivalent of 為什麼|为什么[wei4 shen2 me5]
variant of 怎麼了|怎么了[zen3 me5 le5]
youngest/most junior/tiny/one (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers, esp. on telephone or in military)/one or ace on dice or dominoes/variant of 吆[yao1], to shout
modal particle indicating that sth is obvious/particle indicating a pause for emphasis
dialectal equivalent of 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]
don't tell me .../could it be that...?
hey!/(interjection used to attract attention or to express surprise or disapprobation)
variant of 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]
anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
